name: Born to Adventure
description: You were born with an adventurer's spirit and natural talents that set you apart from others. Your destiny calls you to greatness.

options.name: Adventurer's Spirit
options.description: +5 Max Morale - Your unwavering spirit inspires you to push forward even in the darkest times.

options.name: Hardy Constitution
options.description: +5 Max Health - Your body is naturally resilient and can withstand more punishment than most.
